405840.name: Stingray
405840.description:
Autodesk® Stingray is a modern game engine designed for pro-indie game makers. Providing unmatched connectivity with Maya, Maya LT, and 3ds Max, physically-based rendering, and a full suite of artist-friendly development tools, Stingray simplifies art-to-engine workflows and lets you produce visually stunning games.

Based on the core technology from the proven Bitsquid game engine, Stingray is the ideal authoring tool for indie game makers looking for an open and flexible 3D game engine. Whether you're a game artist, designer, or programmer, Stingray lets you build, step into, and interact with any world that you can imagine.
405840.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 简体中文
